  • Classes in com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.retry used by com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.context 
    Class and Description

    Defines the behavior to adopt when a request fails.
  • Classes in com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.retry used by com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.retry 
    Class and Description
    RetryDecision
    A decision from the RetryPolicy on how to handle a retry.
    RetryVerdict
    The verdict returned by a RetryPolicy determining what to do when a request failed.
